questions.quote: All right, all right, one more time, one more time! What was the exact phrasing of the request?
Well, did you leave the A/C on? Do you zip over speed bumps? Do you ride the clutch? Things like that.
Peggy, we've got to talk. What is it about me that you find so offensive?
Hey, Jerry! Guess what! The Kramer name might live on! Noreen's late! She's laaate!!
They talk back. They go, "Hey George, how's it going?" I say, "Get the hell out of here!"
Eddie. Yes, um, I am so sorry but I'm afraid we're gonna have to... promote you.
No, nothing here, let's go.  Oh, I forgot to tell you. After I talked to you today my neighbour called me and played my messages to me over the phone.
Well, so, he can live without his Valium for a couple of days.
Oh, she didn't think it was funny. What is she, Rowan & Martin? We're supposed to meet with NBC tomorrow! She completely shattered my confidence. And I'm paying for this, she's my employee!
Alright, let's get going. C'mon, c'mon now.  C'mon, let's get it together..  Yeah?
